topic.title: Meme shitposting
topic.body: Post all your spiciest memes here...

1_1No1EtiPxGfiXXqM4tJNGWxiEH64jgm63Y.body:
> [tsetair](#comment_2_1DTshv8e673kT3yQX3HhM4M9XYg4A4KceE): Jews are going to have a hard time taking over China, since they look white as hell, they can't go covert like they can in the West. Good luck Jew, I really hope it works out for you.

That's why they're trying to interbreed with Chinese (e.g. Kaifeng Jews)
